17
18#include <config.h>
19
20/* Specification. */
21#include "xvasprintf.h"
22
23char *
24xasprintf (const char *format, ...)
25{
26 va_list args;
27 char *result;
28
29 va_start (args, format);
30 result = xvasprintf (format, args);
31 va_end (args);
32
33 return result;
34}
35
